https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2vEP0mubKIp5Xexfj23SvN86aDD.jpg Street pimps, all of them African-American, discuss their lives and work: getting started, being flamboyant, pimping in various U.S. cities, bringing a woman into their group, taking a woman from another pimp, and the rules and regulations of pimping. The men are clear: it's about money. American Pimp
